About

Born in Cavan, Ireland, citizen of the world and addicted to creating, fixing and improving stuff. My curious mind can zone out during any form of creative act and loves learning. Curious? Scroll down to check my Blog or my Timeline!

This site is kindly hosted by Github. Why not check out the code?
